revision.text:
[[File:Welcome to the.png|link=Project:Community Portal|210px|Welcome]][[File:Blank.png|9px|link=]]
[[File:PokeClickerLogo.png|link=Project:About|300px|Pokéclicker Wiki]]
[[File:Wiki_Custom.png|link=|80px]]
[[File:PC_E.png|80px|left|link=]][[File:PC_E.png|right|80px|link=]] A community-driven wiki focusing on [[PokéClicker|Pokéclicker]] that [[Meta:Autoconfirmed_users|anyone with a confirmed Miraheze account]] can [[Help:Editing|edit]].
Today is {{CURRENTDAYNAME}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} at {{CURRENTTIME}}.
The wiki currently has [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:Allpages|articles]] since May 31, 2008.
There is a total of {{NUMBEROFACTIVEUSERS}} active users this month.
Note: Auto-Confirmed accounts are those that have both existed for 4 days and edited pages 10 times. Contact the Wiki Moderators for more information. ---- [[Wikia:Help:How_to_create_a_great_guide_or_tutorial|Wiki tutorial]]{{·}} [[:Category:Help|Help pages]]{{·}} [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord]{{·}} [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]]
[[PokéClicker Wiki:Ruleset|Ruleset and guidelines]]{{·}} [[Special:SpecialPages|Special pages]]{{·}} [[Special:Categories|Categories]]{{·}} [[Special:Preferences|Preferences]]{{·}} [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] ----

Pokéclicker is an open source game built around the story and content of the Pokémon games. This is an idle & clicker type game that is currently in beta release phase. New content and patches are released frequently.

----

Pokémon is sole property of Nintendo and we do not claim to have any ownership of the same.

---- You can start browsing this wiki by scrolling below and clicking on any of the links. == '''Maps & Navigation''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Regions]] [[File:Town map.png|20px]] !! [[Dungeons]] {{dungeontokens}} !! [[Gyms]] [[File:Brock.png|20px]] !! [[Towns & Cities]] [[File:Socialite.png|40px]] !! [[Underground]] [[File:Explorer kit.png|20px]] |- ! [[Shops]] [[File:Eevee_Shuffle.png|20px]] !! [[NPCs]] [[File:Professor_Oak.png|40px]] !! [[Farm]] [[File:WailmerPail_HighRes.png|20px]] !! [[Safari Zone]] [[File:SafariTicket_HighRes.png|20px]] !! [[Battle Frontier]] [[File:Deoxys_Shuffle.png|20px]] |} == '''Items''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Key Items]] [[File:ShardCase_HighRes.png|20px]] !! [[Oak Items]] [[File:Bag_Amulet_Coin_Sprite.png|20px]] !! [[Shops|Shop Items]] [[File:Bag_Token_Collector_Sprite.png|20px]] !! [[Underground#Items|Underground Items]] [[File:Rare_Bone_Updated.png|20px]] !! [[Evolution Items]] [[File:Moon_Stone.png|20px]] |- ! [[Pokéballs]] [[File:Ball_Pokeball.png|20px]] !! [[Battle Items]] [[File:Bag_X_Click_Sprite.png|20px]] !! [[Egg|Eggs]] [[File:Mystery egg.png|20px]] !! [[Berries]] [[File:Cheri.png|20px]] & [[Farm Items]] [[File:Berry_Shovel.png|20px]] !! [[Rare Hold Items]] [[File:Kings_Rock.png|20px]] |} == '''Currencies''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Poké Dollar]] {{pdollar}} !! [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{dungeontokens}} !! [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} |- ! [[Farming Points|Farm Points]] {{farmpoints}} !! [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} !! [[Battle Points]] [[File:Battlepoints.png|20px]] |} == '''Pokémon and Mechanics''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Obtainable Pokémon]] [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] !! [[Baby Pokémon]] [[File:Pichu.png|40px]] !! [[Roaming Pokémon]] [[File:Mew.png|40px]] !! [[Wandering Pokémon]] [[File:Flabébé_(Blue).png|40px]] |- ! [[Gem-Type Advantages]] [[File:Fire_Gem.png|15px]][[File:Water_Gem.png|15px]] !! [[Gems]] [[File:Fairy_Gem.png|20px]] !! [[Protein|Proteins]] [[File:Protein_Item.png|20px]] !! [[Weather]] [[File:Castform.png|40px]] |- ! [[Pokémon Day Care]] [[File:Bag_Blaze_Cassette_Sprite.png|20px]] !! [[Shiny Chance]] [[File:Bag_Shiny_Charm_Sprite.png|20px]] !! [[Pokémon with Alternate Forms]] [[File:Unown_(A).png|40px]] !! [[Events|Event Pokémon]] [[File:Armored_Mewtwo.png|40px]] |} == '''Guides, Calculators, Statistics, and Miscellaneous Information''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] [[File:Unown_(D).png|40px]] !! [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] [[File:Youngster.png|40px]] !! [[Speedruns]] [[File:Bag_Poison_Barb_Sprite.png|20px]] !! [[Challenge Mode]] [[File:Masterball.png|20px]] !! [[Shortcut Keys|Keyboard Shortcuts]] [[File:Jolteon.png|40px]] |- ! [[Route Statistics]] [[File:Porygon_Shuffle.png|30px]] !! [[Pokémon Statistics]] [[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] !! colspan=2|[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] [[File:Starf.png|20px]] !! [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TE5cAKSlA7TAliA001_mIiO1odZ6e4yUEMre0GBW1to/edit?usp=sharing Farm Walkthrough] [[File:Grepa.png|20px]] |- ! colspan=5|[[Pokémon Day Care]] [[File:Chople.png|20px]] & [[Shiny Chance]] [[File:Lum.png|20px]] (Farm Breeding Strategies) |}
Meet the [[Pokéclicker Team]]! [[File:RedSparr0w avatar.png|50px]]

'''Didn't find the page you were looking for? try looking at this list of all [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:AllPages|pages]]''' This wiki is community managed, but we do try to keep a [[To-Do list]] of what is missing or needs updating on this wiki. Please let us know on [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] if you see anything that needs updating on a page or simply add it in the To-Do list. Thank you.
{{Wiki Contributors}}

__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__
